name: dance
description: Kakoune-inspired key bindings, modes, menus and scripting.

scripts.test: yarn run compile --sourcemap && yarn run compile-tests && node ./out/test/run.js
scripts.vscode:prepublish: yarn run generate && yarn run compile && yarn run compile-web

untrustedWorkspaces.description: Existing menu items and mode commands can only be updated if the current workspace is trusted in order to ensure untrusted workspaces do not execute malicious commands.

dance.defaultMode.description: Controls which mode is set by default when an editor is opened.

inheritFrom.description: Controls how default configuration options are obtained for this mode. Specify a string to inherit from the mode with the given name, and null to inherit from the VS Code configuration.

lineHighlight.markdownDescription: Controls the line highlighting applied to active lines. Can be an hex color, a [theme color](https://code.visualstudio.com/api/references/theme-color) or null.
lineHighlight.patternErrorMessage: Color should be an hex color or a '$' sign followed by a color identifier.

lineNumbers.description: Controls the display of line numbers.

onEnterMode.description: Controls what commands should be executed upon entering this mode.

onLeaveMode.description: Controls what commands should be executed upon leaving this mode.

selectionBehavior.description: Controls how selections behave within VS Code.
markdownEnumDescriptions: Selections are anchored to carets, which is the native VS Code behavior; that is, they are positioned *between* characters and can therefore be empty.

Selections are anchored to characters, like Kakoune; that is, they are positioned *on* characters, and therefore cannot be empty. Additionally, one-character selections will behave as if they were non-directional, like Kakoune.

applyTo.description: The selections to apply this style to.
enumDescriptions: Apply to all selections except main selection.

backgroundColor.patternErrorMessage: Color should be an hex color or a '$' sign followed by a color identifier.

borderColor.patternErrorMessage: Color should be an hex color or a '$' sign followed by a color identifier.

decorations.description: The decorations to apply to selections.

applyTo.description: The selections to apply this style to.
enumDescriptions: Apply to all selections except main selection.

backgroundColor.patternErrorMessage: Color should be an hex color or a '$' sign followed by a color identifier.

borderColor.patternErrorMessage: Color should be an hex color or a '$' sign followed by a color identifier.

applyTo.description: The selections to apply this style to.
enumDescriptions: Apply to all selections except main selection.

backgroundColor.patternErrorMessage: Color should be an hex color or a '$' sign followed by a color identifier.

borderColor.patternErrorMessage: Color should be an hex color or a '$' sign followed by a color identifier.

hiddenSelectionsIndicatorsDecoration.description: The decorations to apply to the hidden selections indicator, shown when some selections are below or above the lines currently shown in the editor. Specify an empty object {} to disable this indicator.

dance.modes.description: Controls the different modes available in Dance.

dance.menus.description: Controls the different menus available in Dance.

markdownEnumDescriptions: A `palette` menu is a standard VSCode QuickPick menu, e.g. like the stock VSCode command palette.
A `hotkey` menu is used to give a menu and keybinds emulating Kakoune's multi-key commands, e.g. [g]oto ‚Üí [l]ine-end.

command.description: Command to execute on item selection.

args.description: Arguments to the command to execute.

e.text: to last char of last line

f.text: to file whose name is selected

dance.systemClipboardRegister.description: Controls which register maps to the system clipboard.

dance.enabled.description: Controls whether the Dance keybindings are enabled.
dance.enabled.deprecationMessage: dance.enabled is deprecated; disable the Dance extension instead.

dance.normalMode.lineHighlight.markdownDescription: Controls the line highlighting applied to active lines in normal mode. Can be an hex color, a [theme color](https://code.visualstudio.com/api/references/theme-color) or null.
dance.normalMode.lineHighlight.markdownDeprecationMessage: Built-in modes are deprecated. Use `#dance.modes#` instead.

dance.insertMode.lineHighlight.markdownDescription: Controls the line highlighting applied to active lines in insert mode. Can be an hex color, a [theme color](https://code.visualstudio.com/api/references/theme-color) or null.
dance.insertMode.lineHighlight.markdownDeprecationMessage: Built-in modes are deprecated. Use `#dance.modes#` instead.

dance.normalMode.lineNumbers.description: Controls the display of line numbers in normal mode.
dance.normalMode.lineNumbers.markdownDeprecationMessage: Built-in modes are deprecated. Use `#dance.modes#` instead.

dance.insertMode.lineNumbers.description: Controls the display of line numbers in insert mode.
dance.insertMode.lineNumbers.markdownDeprecationMessage: Built-in modes are deprecated. Use `#dance.modes#` instead.

dance.normalMode.cursorStyle.description: Controls the cursor style in normal mode.
dance.normalMode.cursorStyle.markdownDeprecationMessage: Built-in modes are deprecated. Use `#dance.modes#` instead.

dance.insertMode.cursorStyle.description: Controls the cursor style in insert mode.
dance.insertMode.cursorStyle.markdownDeprecationMessage: Built-in modes are deprecated. Use `#dance.modes#` instead.

dance.insertMode.selectionStyle.description: The style to apply to selections in insert mode.
dance.insertMode.selectionStyle.markdownDeprecationMessage: Built-in modes are deprecated. Use `#dance.modes#` instead.

dance.selectionBehavior.description: Controls how selections behave within VS Code.
markdownEnumDescriptions: Selections are anchored to carets, which is the native VS Code behavior; that is, they are positioned *between* characters and can therefore be empty.

Selections are anchored to characters, like Kakoune; that is, they are positioned *on* characters, and therefore cannot be empty. Additionally, one-character selections will behave as if they were non-directional, like Kakoune.
dance.selectionBehavior.markdownDeprecationMessage: Built-in modes are deprecated. Use `#dance.modes#` instead.
